gst_unavailable_message: Please add GSTIN in company setting to view report.
month_report_download_note_gstr3b: Select month Wise Date to download GSTR3B report.
outward_supplies_details: Details of outward supplies of goods and services
month_report_download_note_gstr2: Select month Wise Date to view GSTR2 summary.
inward_supplies_details: Details of inward supplies of goods and services
gstr2_push_disabled: We've temporarily disabled the GSTR-2 push option in Giddh Books as GSTN has disabled it.
return_file_note: After filing your returns, you can make payment through the GST portal and record it here.
gstin_unavailable_error: No GST Number found for selected company

filing.gst_filed: GST Return of April 2009 till date is filed successfully
filing.return_file_note: Click below to file return of latest data
filing.gst_filed_success: Gst Return Of {{ PERIOD_FROM }} - {{ PERIOD_TO }} is Filed Successfully
filing.transaction_summary_filing: A summary of all the transactions in the current filing period which are ready to be pushed to GSTN.
filing.b2c_small_details_invoices: Details of invoices with value less than 2.5 lakhs that you've issued to consumers other than B2C (Large) transactions.
filing.b2c_small_details_no_invoices: There is no summary of invoices with value less than 2.5 lakhs, other than B2C (Large) that you've issued to consumers.
filing.document_issued_description: Document Issued denotes all documents that you have issued in the corresponding filing period which you have pushed to GSTN. Enter the first and last serial number of each document for the corresponding filing period, the total number of documents and the number of cancelled documents.
filing.hsn_summary_description: This section includes the HSN-wise summary of the items you have sold
filing.nil_summary_description: This section displays the sale of goods and services that are nil rated. Nil rated goods and services are those that have 0% GST but allows you to claim ITC on the filing paid on inputs
filing.reconcilation_note: All transactions in Giddh Books whose vendor GSTIN, invoice number,  invoice date, invoice amount and tax amount are same as the transactions in GSTN are displayed in this section.

gstr3b.email_tooltip: If no email id is provided, email will be by default sent to you/company creator
gstr3b.outward_inward_supplies: 3.1 Details of Outward Supplies and inward supplies liable to reverse charge
gstr3b.outward_taxable_supplies_non_zero: (a) Outward taxable supplies (other than zero rated, nil rated and exempted)

aside_menu.gst_return_note: Please take a note of the following before you submit your GST return:
aside_menu.gst_authenticated: You Are Already Authenticated with Giddh Provider {{ IS_VAYANA_AUTHENTICATED }}
aside_menu.gst_file_note1: The transactions under the Transaction Summary tab will be pushed to the GSTN as individual transactions.
aside_menu.gst_file_note2: Along with the documents issued, the transactions under HSL, NiL, and B2CS category will be pushed to the GSTN as summaries.
aside_menu.gst_file_note3: When you Submit and File data to the GSTN, the email updates will be sent to xyz@abc.com. This can be easily edited and changed in the Profile tab under Settings.
aside_menu.points_accepted_note: Make sure that you have entered the number of Documents Issued(current period) in the Documents Issued tab.
aside_menu.gst_form_acceptance: I accept that on clicking proceed, the return will be locked. I can't undo this or make changes to the return either via Giddh or the GSTN portal.
aside_menu.submit_gst_error: Please Enter Submit In Text Box..
